description_for_human: AI-powered code generation platform for building production-ready applications
description_for_model: HeftCoder is an AI-powered code generation platform that helps developers build production-ready React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS applications using autonomous AI agents. Users can describe what they want to build in natural language and HeftCoder generates the complete codebase. Key features include: intelligent IDE with real-time AI assistance, CLI tools for terminal workflows, instant live preview, multi-file project support, and one-click deployment. Pricing: Basic $9/month (10,000 credits), Pro $25/month (50,000 credits), Studio $59/month (150,000 credits). All plans include 7-day free trial.
